GrandChallenges.name: Develop sustainable fusion energy
GrandChallenges.description: Achieve practical and economical nuclear fusion as a clean energy source.

Goal.name: Sustainable Fusion Power
Goal.description: Develop a fusion reactor capable of net-positive energy output for commercial use.

Technologies.name: Tokamak Reactors
Technologies.description: A doughnut-shaped device using magnetic fields to confine plasma for fusion reactions.

Research.name: High-Temperature Superconductors
Research.description: Develop advanced superconductors for stronger magnetic fields at higher temperatures.
institution: MIT Plasma Science and Fusion Center

Impacts.name: Carbon Emissions Reduction
Impacts.description: Reduction in greenhouse gases by replacing fossil fuels with fusion energy.

Scope.name: Global Impact
Scope.description: Wide-scale energy production to meet global demands.

Stakeholders.name: Energy Companies
Stakeholders.description: Invest and adopt fusion technology for commercial energy production.

GrandChallenges.name: Enhance energy storage
GrandChallenges.description: Create efficient, long-duration energy storage systems to support renewable energy.

Goal.name: Long-Duration Energy Storage
Goal.description: Develop energy storage solutions with a capacity exceeding 10 hours for grid use.

Technologies.name: Solid-State Batteries
Technologies.description: Advanced batteries using solid electrolytes for higher capacity and safety.

Research.name: Solid Electrolyte Optimization
Research.description: Improve ionic conductivity and stability in solid-state materials.

Impacts.name: Renewable Energy Integration
Impacts.description: Facilitate the use of renewable energy by providing consistent power supply.

Scope.name: Global Energy Storage
Scope.description: Address energy storage needs across various regions and climates.

Stakeholders.name: Battery Manufacturers
Stakeholders.description: Develop and produce advanced energy storage technologies.

GrandChallenges.name: Improve solar energy conversion
GrandChallenges.description: Increase the efficiency and affordability of photovoltaic cells.

Goal.name: High-Efficiency Solar Cells
Goal.description: Achieve a solar cell efficiency greater than 40% at a competitive cost.

Technologies.name: Perovskite Solar Cells
Technologies.description: Emerging solar technology offering high efficiency and low manufacturing costs.

Research.name: Stability Enhancement
Research.description: Improve the stability and longevity of perovskite-based solar cells.

Impacts.name: Accessible Renewable Energy
Impacts.description: Increase accessibility to affordable solar power globally.

Scope.name: Solar Energy Deployment
Scope.description: Enable solar energy use in both urban and rural settings.

Stakeholders.name: Solar Energy Companies
Stakeholders.description: Produce and deploy solar panels for energy production.

Goal.name: Scalable Carbon Capture
Goal.description: Develop CCS technologies that can capture millions of tons of CO2 annually.

Technologies.description: Remove CO2 directly from the atmosphere for storage or utilization.

Research.description: Enhance the capacity and regeneration of CO2 absorbent materials.

Impacts.description: Reduce atmospheric CO2 levels to mitigate global warming.

Scope.description: Apply CCS technologies in industrial and energy sectors globally.

Stakeholders.description: Support policies and funding for CCS deployment.

GrandChallenges.name: Alternative protein sources
GrandChallenges.description: Develop and promote sustainable alternatives to traditional animal protein.

Goal.name: Sustainable Protein Supply
Goal.description: Provide high-quality protein with reduced environmental impact.
Goal.metric: Percentage of alternative proteins in diets

Technologies.name: Lab-Grown Meat
Technologies.description: Cultivate animal cells to produce meat without livestock farming.

Research.name: Scaling Lab-Meat Production
Research.description: Develop cost-effective methods for large-scale production.

Impacts.name: Reduced Greenhouse Gases
Impacts.description: Lower emissions associated with traditional livestock farming.

Scope.name: Global Food Systems
Scope.description: Incorporate alternative proteins into diets worldwide.

Stakeholders.name: Food Tech Companies
Stakeholders.description: Innovate and market alternative protein products.

GrandChallenges.name: Soil health
GrandChallenges.description: Preserve and improve soil health to sustain agriculture and ecosystems.

Goal.name: Healthy Soils Initiative
Goal.description: Enhance soil fertility and carbon sequestration worldwide.

Technologies.name: Biochar Applications
Technologies.description: Use biochar to improve soil health and carbon storage.

Research.name: Soil Microbial Enhancements
Research.description: Develop methods to boost beneficial soil microorganisms.

Impacts.name: Improved Agricultural Output
Impacts.description: Increase crop yields through better soil management practices.

Scope.name: Global Soil Health
Scope.description: Promote practices to maintain and restore soil fertility worldwide.

Stakeholders.name: Farmers and Agronomists
Stakeholders.description: Adopt and implement soil health technologies and practices.

GrandChallenges.name: Ocean health
GrandChallenges.description: Preserve marine ecosystems and ensure sustainable use of ocean resources.

Goal.name: Marine Ecosystem Restoration
Goal.description: Reduce ocean pollution and restore degraded marine habitats.

Technologies.name: Autonomous Cleanup Systems
Technologies.description: Deploy robots and automated systems to remove ocean waste.

Research.name: Marine Robotics
Research.description: Enhance underwater robots for debris collection and monitoring.

Impacts.name: Improved Marine Biodiversity
Impacts.description: Restore habitats for marine species and enhance biodiversity.

Scope.name: Global Ocean Health
Scope.description: Focus on highly polluted marine environments and biodiversity hotspots.

Stakeholders.name: Marine Conservation Organizations
Stakeholders.description: Advocate and implement measures to protect ocean health.

GrandChallenges.name: Freshwater conservation
GrandChallenges.description: Protect freshwater ecosystems and manage water resources sustainably.

Goal.name: Sustainable Water Management
Goal.description: Ensure clean and abundant freshwater for ecosystems and human needs.
Goal.metric: Increase in freshwater ecosystem health index (%)

Technologies.name: Water Monitoring Sensors
Technologies.description: Deploy IoT sensors to track water quality and flow in real time.

Research.name: Advanced Water Purification
Research.description: Develop new technologies to improve water filtration efficiency.

Impacts.name: Enhanced Water Security
Impacts.description: Provide reliable access to clean water for ecosystems and communities.

Scope.name: Global Freshwater Management
Scope.description: Protect rivers, lakes, and aquifers from overuse and pollution.

Stakeholders.name: Water Resource Managers
Stakeholders.description: Develop and implement sustainable water management practices.

GrandChallenges.name: Restore degraded lands
GrandChallenges.description: Revitalize lands affected by deforestation, desertification, and industrial activities.

Goal.name: Land Restoration Initiative
Goal.description: Restore 50% of degraded lands globally by 2050.

Technologies.name: Reforestation Drones
Technologies.description: Use drones to plant trees and monitor land restoration progress.

Research.name: Soil Rejuvenation Methods
Research.description: Develop techniques to improve soil fertility in degraded lands.

Impacts.name: Enhanced Ecosystem Services
Impacts.description: Restore the ability of land to provide natural resources and benefits.

Scope.name: Global Land Restoration
Scope.description: Focus on regions with severe land degradation.

Stakeholders.name: Environmental NGOs
Stakeholders.description: Lead efforts to restore lands through funding and coordination.

GrandChallenges.name: Combat biodiversity loss
GrandChallenges.description: Develop strategies to preserve species and ecosystems.

Goal.name: Biodiversity Preservation
Goal.description: Reduce species extinction rates and protect key ecosystems.
Goal.metric: Increase in species population stability index (%)

Technologies.name: Conservation Genomics
Technologies.description: Use genetic tools to protect and revive endangered species.

Research.name: Habitat Connectivity Studies
Research.description: Design strategies to link fragmented habitats for wildlife movement.

Impacts.name: Stable Ecosystems
Impacts.description: Support balanced and resilient ecosystems worldwide.

Scope.name: Global Biodiversity Conservation
Scope.description: Focus on biodiversity hotspots and threatened regions.

Stakeholders.name: Conservation Scientists
Stakeholders.description: Research and implement biodiversity protection strategies.

GrandChallenges.name: Reduce carbon emissions
GrandChallenges.description: Develop technologies and policies to significantly cut global carbon emissions.

Goal.name: Net-Zero Carbon
Goal.description: Achieve global net-zero carbon emissions by 2050.

Technologies.name: Carbon Capture and Storage (CCS)
Technologies.description: Capture CO2 from industrial processes and store it underground.

Research.name: Direct Air Capture
Research.description: Develop scalable systems to remove CO2 directly from the atmosphere.

Impacts.name: Climate Stabilization
Impacts.description: Limit global warming and its associated impacts.

Scope.name: Global Emissions Reduction
Scope.description: Focus on high-emission sectors and regions.

Stakeholders.name: Policy Makers
Stakeholders.description: Design and enforce carbon reduction policies worldwide.
